website_summaries.verdict: Features, warranty, and looks put it at the top of the pack when it comes to value.
pros: Attractive pinewood construction, sturdy rails, above-standard safety ratings, and 1-year limited warranty make it a solid deal
cons: Somewhat challenging to put together, and assembly instructions are confusing
The middle feels a bit weak
not ideal for jumping or rough play

customer_reviews.title: this bed is a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: poor design. who ever came up with a two piece side frame needs to go back to school. After spending a lot of time assembling bed picked it up to carry it into my grand daughters room and the bed frame all but broke in half. all because of the center leg joint built into the frame design. Not worth the trouble of taking apart packaging it back up and trying to return it. I would like my money back, but we all know that is not going to happen.
customer_reviews.author: mecmark

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with this bed
customer_reviews.text: I searched around for a reliable bed that was also affordable. I have twins so I needed two and I wanted to stay within a budget. I’m very happy with this bed! The set up was about the same as any other furniture assembly. Just make sure everything is lined up how it’s supposed to be. The quality is really great especially for the price, and it seems to be holding up to my wild three year olds quite well. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Torres

customer_reviews.title: Fits a regular crib size mattress making it an easy transition from crib to bed without having to by ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits a regular crib size mattress making it an easy transition from crib to bed without having to by another expensive mattress. Assembly was pretty easy but you do need two sets of hands for some parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: Siderails are in two pieces joined by a bracket- not very sturdy. If i try to slide the bed to move it by myself you can hear it crack. Obviously not a quality piece, but we'll make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kratwell

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice in Toddler Beds!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased on a whime. We did not like how our cribs for our twins converted, so we looked into actual toddler beds. These are fantastic!! They have withheld two little energetic boys you play hard and sleep hard. Made from quality wood and clear instructions, I would highly recommend this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Scott

customer_reviews.title: Really Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how sturdy this bed is. I weigh about 125, and was able to sit on it. I’d recommend it, because it’s also very low to the ground, so I don’t have to worry about my toddler getting hurt if he happened to roll out of bed, (despite the rails).
customer_reviews.author: Allie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Takes quite a bit of assembly but looks nice and solid
customer_reviews.text: This was not a simple assembly in terms of the number of steps but it worked well, everything fit nice and the finished bed is quite nice. If you are a little handy, this works out well.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Socwell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, dependable bed, A+++ for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bed in the pecan color when it was $54. For the value and price, you can't beat it or get any better. Another retailer (Wal----) was selling it for the same price, but since I'm a Prime member, I received it in 2 days. The bed is sturdy and classy. The wood is finished and polished. Looks great in my daughter's room. My husband took about 30 minutes to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: MizT

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little bed for the price. Easy to put together, albeit a lot of pieces. Use it for our one year old after she began to walk to get her out of the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: great bed
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for my 3 year old daughter. It took about 2 hours to put together and the instructions were a bit confusing. We've had it for a little over a month and it has been perfectly fine with her and her younger sister jumping on it and playing on it. Its definitely sturdier than the comparable bed from Walmart. It is slightly lower than the lowest setting on a crib, so under bed storage can be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: lauren m

customer_reviews.title: Great bed with a good look
customer_reviews.text: Great little bed. Does not look cheap! My toddler felt secure in this. I would say that as he got older and more creative and explorative he got his leg stuck in between the bars. He didn't get hurt but it took a few minutes to get him out.
customer_reviews.author: PJaye

customer_reviews.title: This bed is perfect for my sweet girl
customer_reviews.text: This bed is perfect for my sweet girl. I was a little hesitant after reading the reviews, but I decided to purchase it and I'm so glad I did. It took me an hour and 20 to put this together by myself(because I didn't want to wait for my husband to get home lol).
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and very sturdy. The pecan color is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Mori

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged. And found this piece broke! My boy was happy about getting a bed now he can’t sleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: laranda Jordan

customer_reviews.title: "What a nice bed!"  (a quote from my 3 year old grandson!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is definitely a sturdy and well-made piece of furniture. It takes a little time to assemble, but it is worth the time required. We had no problems because the instructions were easy to read and follow. We feel it was a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J Gilstrap

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: The bed came out as expected....but the TIME to put it together was a nightmare!!! After a few hours trying to do it by myself, it took me and my Hubby a few More hours to complete it. It's the perfect size for our soon to be 2yr old granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: Easier to put together without following directions. It is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great starter bed!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bed. We bought it for our 21month old son because he was climbing out of his crib. It is very sturdy and was easy for me to put together by myself but would be easier with two people.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice n comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed for my 4yr old daughter. She sleeps in it every night. Nice n comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: he used to have a wood lightning mcqueen bed and i got this and he sleeps a lot better on this
customer_reviews.text: my son loves this bed. he used to have a wood lightning mcqueen bed and i got this and he sleeps a lot better on this bed
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS PICTURED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular toddler bed based on the fact that the picture of the product didn't have an additional leg in the middle of the bed. I know I would stub my toe a million times on a bed that had one. Sadly, when the bed arrived, it has an additional leg in the middle! WHY DOES IT NOT LOOK LIKE THE PICTURE!!!! I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Miss JJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice little toddlers bed
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little worried about the couplings that join the bed in the center, but it seems sturdy enough for my one year old. Assembly was about 25 min with great directions in English.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: come with wrong pieces
customer_reviews.text: The bed came with two sets of left bed rails and no right bed rails. I could not put it together. I returned for replacement a new one. The 2nd bed came with some pieces which had missing hole and I could not insert screw through it.
customer_reviews.author: Krongthong wongsritrang

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The bed is made of a very low quality wood that arrived with splits in it. Because some of the boards that were splitting would be used to support the mattress (thereby, also supporting our son's weight), we opted to return this item. The price was right, but you can't put a price on safety, which this bed was lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Skarriann

customer_reviews.title: Terrible had to return
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited for this bed. Great price. Looked nice out of the box. As we started to assemble none of the pieces fit. They had holes in the wrong place, one board was going the wrong way. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hubert

customer_reviews.title: This bed is great. It was easy for me to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great. It was easy for me to put together by myself and so far it has held up to a 4 year old and a 2 year old jumping and playing on it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbeetee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and convenient for my tot! Just the right size for her little legs to get in and out of bed. Guard rails keep her safe and me at peace!
customer_reviews.author: Mikela Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice sleigh bed styling High bed rails Sturdy design Extra Reinforcment Cons: Lingering paint smell, had to air it out for a few days before I would let me little guy use it
customer_reviews.author: A. Abeyta

customer_reviews.title: Serves it purpose
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty sturdy. The kids jump on it all the time and it hasn't broken yet. My 4 year old fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Only issue is that its a little narrow as our daughter rolls around like crazy at night
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves her "big girl" bed. Only issue is that its a little narrow as our daughter rolls around like crazy at night. She is constantly hitting her head or feet on the rails. This is not necessarily a problem with the bed but just an observation.
customer_reviews.author: Andreana

customer_reviews.title: Love it! This is the 2nd toddler bed I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This is the 2nd toddler bed I bought from them. They hold up well and are pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 21 month old Granddaughters loves it. Sleeps longer and no fuss when time for bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bed was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Bed was easy to put together. Holds my fiance and daughter (as she likes to put her to bed). Handles a jumping three year old and still small enough to make her feel like it's her own "space". Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: vinman

customer_reviews.title: Good bed
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed easy to build. Accurate description and very fairly priced
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Love the bed....however
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very nice and well made. The "however" was due to their promise for delivery. When I purcahsed the bed it was in stock and said it would ship in a couple of days. It took over 2 weeks to get the bed and it didn't ship for over a week after I ordered it. I would not order from this company again unless I ordered in plenty of time before I really needed it. I am really big on customer service and promises. The 3 rating was for that.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Grannie
customer_reviews.text: The Athena Anna Sleigh Toddler bed in white is an attractive and sturdy bed. It does fit a standard crib mattress and sheets. From reading the item description before ordering, I expected the bottom to be a solid piece of wood. The bottom is made of slats. The instructions for putting the bed together are not well written. The construction required two adults and considerable time. The finished product is satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, you defiantly need two people to help with keeping parts in place while you put in the screws. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Celedonia Razo Garica

customer_reviews.title: Good bed for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for my 2 year old. It was easy to assemble and still looks good after having a boy climb and bounce on it for a year and half.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: Great bed especially for the price! Very cute and my daughter loves it! The bed was put together a month ago and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: ruth brown

customer_reviews.title: This toddler bed is the greatest; very convenient for my daughter' small room
customer_reviews.text: This toddler bed is the greatest; very convenient for my daughter' small room. You can leave side rails off if you'd like for a "big kid" feel.
customer_reviews.author: Jacasia

customer_reviews.title: Only for gentle kids, not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It looks okay but the side support beam is in two pieces so it makes it basically able to bend in half
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bed is perfect size for my daughter who is turning 2 years ...
customer_reviews.text: The bed is perfect size for my daughter who is turning 2 years old. Very sturdy & cute. The canopy sold by Amazon looks great with it! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Stir

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product, not very stable. Unclear directions. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: vholland01226

customer_reviews.title: Great bed but a pain in the ass to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bed but a pain in the ass to put together. Screws don't line up. Great bed for price though.
customer_reviews.author: Eli June

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! I will say you need two people to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Holds up even when my 3 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Holds up even when my 3 year old plays and jumps on it! Didn't take long to put together either.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Evans

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works but it's really not as sturdy as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor assembly
customer_reviews.text: Center of bed is not very sturdy. Had to buy extra brackets to stabalize the center. Took awhile and was complicated to assemble. Not all the pre drilled holes lined up. Had to drill out new holes to be able to assemble correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Korri Askren

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: We were almost finished putting the bed together when we discovered that we were sent 2 of one part and none of another. We called the manufacturer and they sent the part which we received 12 days later.
customer_reviews.author: KLK

customer_reviews.title: Came with wrong pieces
customer_reviews.text: The bed came with two sets of right bed rails and no left bed rails. I could not even get past step one of putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R  Latimer

customer_reviews.title: ... a 4 because the leg in the middle in annoying. We often kick it
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 4 because the leg in the middle in annoying. We often kick it, forgetting it is there. Other than that great bed. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Jensen

customer_reviews.title: True to color
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color match. Instructions easy to read, lots of pieces which could be intimidating but overall For the price, just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have bout a few of these toddler beds this one is the best it is good quality and looks real nice.
customer_reviews.author: chaya

customer_reviews.title: bottom line... happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: it isnt quite fine furniture, and it isnt super sturdy, but it looks great and is holding up well. i cut a piece of underlayment to fit on top of the slats and it has held about 230lbs without issue. I moved the parts around so both guards are on the left side and the right side is against the wall- glad the symmetrical design makes this possible without much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: My Self

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t too hard to assemble Fairly durable if you ask me
customer_reviews.author: I

product_meta.title: Athena Anna Sleigh Toddler Bed, White
product_meta.description: The Anna toddler bed is made of solid wood. This sturdy yet lightweight piece of furniture is easy to assemble, available in a variety of colors, all with a non toxic finish. Both sides are equipped with guardrails, and the solid wood mattress support can bear up to 50 pounds.
feature_bullets: Guard rails keep baby inside bed so that you and your baby can fall asleep knowing they are safe
Reinforced slat mattress support system with 6 legs
JPMA certified; Meets and exceeds US federal safety regulations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars48 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
